Title: The Boys
Writer: Stephen Sewell (screenplay), Gordon Graham (based on the original play by)
Actors: David Wenham, Toni Collette, Lynette Curran, John Polson
Plot: Brett Sprague is a violent and psychopathic man, who is released on parole after serving a sentence for assault. As he returns to his family house and we watch him and his brothers, Stevie and Glenn, for the next 24 hours, it becomes clear this day will not end well.
